game.name: Farm Keeper
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 덱 빌딩 농사 게임으로 수확을 극대화하고 임대료 정복 및 무작위 타일 선택을 통한 농장 확장에 초점을 맞춘 게임입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A tile-based farming game where success means maximizing yields to survive the rent, expanding your farm through random tile choices.

reviewHighlights.text: Such a fun little game, really great for passing time
Real fun tiles builder that needs some strategy at higher difficulties. Unlocking secret tiles and trying them out the next runs is exciting and the a...
